channel.title: OGM Calls - Open Global Mind Forum
channel.description: Topics in the 'OGM Calls' category Recordings, chat transcripts, call transcripts, and discussions following OGM calls. Use a single separate topic for each call.

item.title: Opening Up Tuesday Calls
item.dc:creator: bhnelson
item.description:
As Matt mentioned in last Thursday’s Open Call, we are broadening the audience of our regular Tuesday check-in calls. Until now Matt, Jerry, and I have been using this time to have more tactical discussions about how to mobilize around the OGM vision. It is time to include other voices in that as well.

As of now, the meetings will follow our normal weekly cadence on Tuesdays at 10:00 AM EST/16:00 CEST. We can discuss further tomorrow morning. I expect our initial discussions to be focused on the large themes that emerged during the OGM Design call, as well as how to continue harvesting the materials that we’ve received thus far.

To add this to your Google calendar, please follow this link:

Zoom Video

Video Conferencing, Web Conferencing, Webinars, Screen Sharing

Zoom is the leader in modern enterprise video communications, with an easy, reliable cloud platform for video and audio conferencing, chat, and webinars across mobile, desktop, and room systems. Zoom Rooms is the original software-based conference...

Alternatively, the Zoom room is here: https://collectivenext.zoom.us/j/984508398?pwd=M2FOY0l3aWFmaVdxWlYxR2ZxS0h1QT09

See you there!
Hank
